Description: THE PROPOSED AGREEMENT WILL ADDRESS THE EROSION OF THE LAS VEGAS WASH INTO LAKE MEAD.THE LAS VEGAS WASH IS EXPERIENCING SIGNIFICANT CHANNEL EROSION FROM THE PRENNIAL FLOWS OF STORM WATER AND WASTEWATER EFFLUENT FROM THE LAS VEGAS VALLEY. ADDITIONAL STRUCTURES ARE NEEDED TO CURTAIL THE EROSION AND PROTECT INFRASTRUCTURE UPSTREAM OF THE LAKE MEAD NATION RECREATION AREA BOUNDARIES.

THIS AGREEMENT COVERS THE ACTIVITIES NECESSARY TO ASSIST AND SUPPORT THE SOUTHERN NEVADA WATER AUTHORITY TO WORK ON THE CONSTRUCTION OF AN EROSION CONTROL STRUCTURE ALONG THE LAS VEGAS WASH WITHIN THE BOUNDARIES OF THE LAKE MEAD NATIONAL RECREATION AREA WITH THE COOPERATION OF THE NATIONAL PARK SERVICE AND BUREAU OF RECLAMATION TO ADDRESS EROSION OF THE WASH INTO LAKE MEAD WITHOUT EROSION CONTROL STRUCTURES, CONTINUED EROSION IN THE LAS VEGAS WASH REDUCES THE QUALITY OF WATER FLOWING INTO LAKE MEAD AND THREATENS THE INTEGRITY OF UPSTREAM FACILITIES  ACTIVITIES THAT WILL BE FUNDED INCLUDE BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE FOLLOWING GEOTECHNICAL SURVEYSENVIRONMENTAL PERMITTINGWEIR DESIGN, REVIEW AND FINALIZATIONCONSTRUCTION BEGINSCOMPLETION OF THE PROJECT WILL ALLEVIATE THE EROSION THAT IS CURRENTLY OCCURRING IN LAS VEGAS WASH  THIS BENEFITS RECLAMATION BY IMPROVING THE QUALITY OF THE WATER THAT FLOWS FROM THE WASH INTO LAKE MEAD  THE PUBLIC BENEFITS NOT ONLY FROM THE IMPROVED WATER QUALITY BUT ALSO FROM THE SAFEGUARDING OF THE INFRASTRUCTURE LOCATED UPSTREAM, INCLUDING THE LAKE LAS VEGAS DAM AND THE NORTHSHORE BRIDGE
LAKE MEAD / LAS VEGAS WASH PROGRAM
REVEGETATION IMPLEMENTATION, MAINTENANCE AND MONITORING ALONG LAS VEGAS WASH
WATER QUALITY MONITORING IN THE LAS VEGAS WASH MAINSTREAM AND TRIBUTARIES
LAS VEGAS WASH COORDINATION COMMITTEE PROGRAM MANAGEMENT
